sentences.en: 'someone stole my house!'she said in dismay.
sentences.cn: “ 有人偷了我们家! ” 她惊恐地说.

sentences.en: "The gay mayor maybe lay in the hay by the Baby bay," he says in dismay.
sentences.cn: 他沮丧地说：“快活的市长大概躺在婴儿湾边上的干草中。

sentences.en: Both men had just begun to swim towards the shore, when they noticed with dismay that the speed - boat was moving in a circle.
sentences.cn: 这两个人刚刚开始向岸边游去, 这时他们突然惊愕地看到快艇正在作圆周运动.

sentences.en: I am filled with dismay at the news.
sentences.cn: 我对这个消息极为震惊.

sentences.en: Local councillors have reacted with dismay and indignation.
sentences.cn: 地方政务委员的反应是惊恐和愤怒。

sentences.en: Lucy discovered to her dismay that she was pregnant.
sentences.cn: 露西惊恐地发现自己怀孕了。

sentences.en: Meg looked up at her in dismay.
sentences.cn: 梅格抬头焦虑地望了她一眼。

sentences.en: Otherwise, inundation would ensue to our dismay.
sentences.cn: 若不疏导, 只能眼巴巴看着它泛滥.

sentences.en: She assumed an air of confidence in spite of her dismay.
sentences.cn: 她尽管惊慌,但仍装作有信心的样子.

sentences.en: She could not hide her dismay at the result.
sentences.cn: 她无法掩饰自己对这一结果的惶恐不安。

sentences.en: The committee was dismayed by what it had been told.
sentences.cn: 该委员会被所告知的情况搞得焦虑不安。

sentences.en: The enemy retreated in perfect dismay.
The European Court's decision has been greeted with dismay by fishermen.
sentences.cn: 渔民对欧洲法庭的裁决感到失望。

sentences.en: The poor election turnout dismayed politicians.
sentences.cn: 投票人数少，政治家们感到失望。

sentences.en: The thought of leaving filled him with dismay .
sentences.cn: 想到要离开，他心里充满了忧伤。

sentences.en: To their dismay, the door was locked.
sentences.cn: 使他们惊慌的是, 门已被锁上了.

sentences.en: We were all looking at each other in dismay and at a loss for words.
sentences.cn: 我们都面面相觑,不知说什么才好.

sentences.en: Wuduo stuck out her tongue in dismay at her gaffe.
sentences.cn: 五多把舌伸伸,表示口不关风说错了话.
